title: Effects of different postharvest drying processes on flavonoid content and enzymatic activity of Styphnolobium japonicum (L.) Schott flowers for industrial and medicinal use
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Ya-Feng Zuo, Xin-Qiu Liu, Xiang-Song Meng, Meng-Hu Wang, Jian Tang, Ting-Ting Hu, Wen-Jian Wang, Wei Zhang, De-Ling Wu
